entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Maps.Map crashes example app #28718
  • Microsoft team deadlock MAUI, MSAL, WebView2 #28717
  • [.NET10]I9-Scroll mode "KeepLastItemInView" does not keep the last item at the end of the displayed list when adding new items. #28716
    .NET 10.0-preview4

Closed

  • [Android][iOS] Page doesn't function properly when loaded into WebView #21969
  • iOS: button won't expand vertically to fit long text when LineBreakMode="WordWrap" #22054
  • Application won't run #28543

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Support for KeepLastItemInView for CV2 #28720
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2

Merged

  • [ci] try publish the zip #28719
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • [NET10] Add global resources and configuration method #28649
    area-xaml, area-core-hosting, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Stop iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation by looking at VisualElement computed Constraint #28479
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix iOS CollectionView not reacting properly to orientation changes #28670
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [iOS] CV2 ItemsLayout update #28675
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2
  • [xamlc] convert {OnPlatform} to OnPlatformExtension<T> #28700
  • [iOS] Inherit AccessibilityTraits for views wrapped inside a WrapperView #27088
    platform/iOS 🍎, do-not-merge, community ✨, area-controls-general, t/a11y, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fix to wrong CancellationToken on IStreamImageSource.GetStreamAsync #28685
    community ✨, area-controls-image
  • [iOS] Fix for Shell custom FlyoutIcon display problem #26016
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Android - Essentials Geolocation | Added support for MslAltitudeMeters #27579
    platform/android 🤖, area-essentials, community ✨
  • [Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • Fixed ListView leak caused by not disposed ContextActionsCell #28702
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, memory-leak 💦, t/perf
  • [iOS] Fix Crash When Using FlyoutItem with DataTemplate and Binding #28683
    area-xaml, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] CV RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand fires on initial data load - fix #28321
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
